text: Miona Springs is a spring in the U.S. state of Georgia. "Miona" is a name of a fictional Indian princess character taken from a Civil War-era work. It was once believed that the waters of Miona Springs had healing properties, and in 1915 a mineral spa resort stood there. ==References== Category:Rivers of Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Bodies of water of Macon County, Georgia
title: Miona Springs
